header.title: Stay Ahead of the Fashion Game

search.title: Discover fashion with
search.text: Our search bar is your gateway to finding the perfect fashion items to fit your style. Don't limit yourself to the same old searches. Try something new, unexpected, and uniquely you.

login.log_in_and_stay_ahead_in_fashion: Log In and Stay Ahead in Fashion

log_in_and_stay_ahead: Log In and Stay Ahead in Fashion
elevate_shop: Elevate Your Shopping: Sign Up Now
agreement: By registering, I agree to Terms of Service & Privacy Policy.
request_join_desc: Join our network of top fashion brands and showcase your products to a wide range of customers. Our platform provides an efficient and user-friendly way to connect with potential customers and increase your brand visibility.

manifest_desc.line_1: At Dokusō, we believe in the power of technology to enhance the shopping experience, but we also believe in the joy of using one's own creativity to shop for clothes.
manifest_desc.line_2: With our AI, finding the perfect piece of clothing is as easy as entering a few keywords and letting your creativity guide you. Our platform matches the text descriptions to the visual features of the images to retrieve the most relevant product pages, so you can find what you're looking for with ease.
manifest_desc.line_3: But we don't just want to make it easy for you to find what you're looking for - we also want to offer a wide selection of stylish and unique clothing items from top brands. We are committed to providing our customers with the best shopping experience possible, and we believe that this means offering high-quality products as well as an innovative and user-friendly platform that allows you to shop creatively.
manifest_desc.line_4: We also believe in the importance of sustainability and ethical practices in the fashion industry. That's why we are committed to partnering with brands that prioritize sustainability and ethical production methods.
manifest_desc.line_5: Thank you for choosing to shop with us. We look forward to helping you find the perfect outfit!
